nodes.bodyText: Do I understand right, that this fix won't work for old (deprecated) bootstrapping? Although, it might be completely fine, because TS views theming is not even needed with deprecated V14 bootstrap, is it (TS views do not work with old bootstrapping)?
WebComponentGenerator class still contains applyTheme code injection for shadow root. Do we need to point it to the vaadin.ts within this PR, or is it another feature/fix?
Not clear from this javadoc what's the file (name), when and where is it being executed, as well as it's goal.
Not sure here, maybe it's totally fine, but is that correct that index.ts file is supposed to be in target/ root, not in target/flow-frontend?

Could you please give a comment here that the relativePath is a relative path of a file given by path to the path frontend/generated? It's really hard to get the meaning of this line of code without any certain example.
Also, don't we check here the result of shouldApplyAppTheme() ? So that if no theme definition => no file generate?
Was this file committed intentionally? Usually it is ignored for flow-tests
